name: ImageTS
author: ImageTS

sections.description:
[EN] You can collect, convert and upload images. You can do all of them with ImageTS easily. It works in a compatible way with WordPress.

[FR] Vous pouvez recueillir, convertir et télécharger les images. Vous pouvez faire tout avec ImageTS facilement. Il est compatible avec WordPress.

[TR] Resimleri bir araya toplayın, dönüştürün ve yükleyin. Tüm bu işlemleri ImageTS ile kolaylıkla yapabilirsiniz. WordPress ile uyumlu çalışır.

Collect images

ImageTS can collect images on web pages, included Google image search, blogs, news websites, Instagram, Pinterest, Tumblr and Flickr.

Convert images

You can crop, resize, add filter or logo with ImageTS. Also you don’t need to download images and upload them to your server particularly.

More contents, more visitors

Your website and blog is more powerful with ImageTS. ImageTS can handle all of your needs about images.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
2.0

All issues fixed, new features added.

1.8

You can modify names in this version.

1.0

Update for nginx and https

0.5

Plugin released.
